original_text: He removed the altars and other places where people worshipped foreign gods. He broke the stone pillars and he cut down the Asherah poles.
korean_text: 이방 제단과 산당을 없애고 주상을 깨뜨리며 아세라 상을 찍고

sentences.original_text: and other places where people worshipped foreign gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들이 이방 신들을 경배하던 다른 장소들도

sentences.original_text: and he cut down the Asherah poles
